body: Kit, I cannot re-create the error on my machine.  The attached file is working fine for me. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4-r35uyukEZvpGB0MLg0cop8Rld7CKHEe**ILX*RWnaEvvd0Wko8k-0MDJQosejf9riL69uistFTBAHoHQuc9iMdvN-d*yNa/RadManOk.JPG) My guess is that you might not have updated your components correctly.  If you upload your GH file, we can test to see if this is the case. -Chris
